meanings.definition: A chemical group consisting of a methyl group attached to an oxygen atom.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the methoxyl in the compound under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The chemist identified the presence of methoxyl in the organic molecule.
meanings.sent3: The methoxyl group seemed to be having a party with the other atoms in the molecule.
meanings.sent4: The methoxyl acted like a bridge connecting the methyl group and the oxygen atom.
meanings.sent5: The unique structure of methoxyl made it stand out among the other chemical groups.
